name: Today's Futons
overview: Todays Futons, Inc. sells all kinds of futon and other furniture products for your home and office needs. Browse through our online catalog for beds, couches, chairs, mattresses, sheets, covers, and of course, futons. We have bi-fold and tri-fold futon models, futon frames, futon mattresses, and futon covers. Store owner Bill Brower, has been in the furniture business for quite some time already, Bill Brower was an early adopter and advocate of futons. He actually owns four at home, one on each of the three bedrooms and one in the living room. He finds them very useful whenever relatives or friends visit and sleep over. Bill is even known to sleep in one from time to time, despite him having his own comfy bed. When not sleeping in futons, Bill is either busy at work or spending quality time with his family. He loves to eat home-cooked meals and enjoys reading a good book whenever possible.
